updateWorldData() - Method in class scenegraph.Group

Updates internal data for new frame.
updateWorldData() - Method in class scenegraph.TriangleMesh
If the object is not hidden, an update of the mesh data is requested (e.g. a deforming/morphing of the mesh data after an update of the morphing weights).
updateWorldData(Mat4) - Method in class scenegraph.SkinCluster
For each joint the actual joint`s transformation matrix (the matrix with the actual position/orientation/scale of the joint in world coordinates) is "transfered" to a transformation matrix for the vertices in skin mesh coordinates.
updateWorldTransform(Mat4) - Method in class scenegraph.AbstCamera
Transforms the camera vectors and positions globally (apply global transformation matrix)
updateWorldTransform(Mat4) - Method in class scenegraph.AbstNode
The transformation matrices are only relevant for spatial nodes.
updateWorldTransform(Mat4) - Method in class scenegraph.AbstSpatial
Builds the world transformation matrix (called global transformation here).
updateWorldTransform(Mat4) - Method in class scenegraph.Group
Calculate global transformation matrix (which is a concatenation of all transformation matrices in the group chain).
